description: Ooguro Mikiko decided to become an animator after seeing the anime Louis Monde III (a thinly-veiled reference to Lupin III) while in high school. She attended the Greater Tokyo Animation Academy and joined Studio Petit on graduation. Thrust into the producer`s role on http://anidb.net/ch21762 [Oppama]`s departure, she was initially at a complete loss, with no idea as to what to do. Gradually, with the help of http://anidb.net/ch21756 [Shihonmatsu] and the others, she got the team to work around her and achieve the seemingly impossible. Oppama nicknamed here Kuromi-chan (from Oo-GURO MI-kiko) and the name just stuck.
name: Ooguro Mikiko
